### Tender Description
 The National Research Council of Canada requires a liquid handler system capable of performing protein crystallization in various formats, including hanging drop, sitting drop, micro batch, and seeding crystallizations in a 96-well format.

### Technical Requirements
 The selected bidder will be expected to provide a system that:

*   Supports hanging drop, sitting drop, micro batch, and seeding crystallizations in a 96-well format
*   Ensures precision and accuracy in setup and execution of crystallizations

### Trade Agreements
 This solicitation is open to bidders who are compliant with the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Procurement Category
 General Distribution (GD)

### Evaluation Criteria
 The evaluation of bids will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.
